title: LangoMango
description: Language learning platform, focused on readers and bookworms.

features.title: What are the key features of the app?

smart_assistance.title: Smart assistance for easy learning
smart_assistance.description: Get in text assistance for reading in your target learning for an easy learning language experience. Get a fluent reading even in not learned parts.

instant_translation.title: Whole sentences instant translation in just one tap
instant_translation.description: Sometimes you just do not understand a sentence or word. Get immediate translations to make the term association and learning possible almost instantly.

adjustable_language.title: Adjustable target language presence in your text
adjustable_language.description: Control how much exposure you have to your learning target language to adapt to fit your level. Achieve a point to enjoy and learn at the same time.

cta.subtitle: Start your 7-day free trial
cta.description: Experience LangoMango's smart reader with no commitment. Cancel anytime during your trial period.

authorPage.title: Authors
authorPage.description: Join LangoMango as an author and monetize your books through our language learning platform.

hero.heading: Join LangoMango Authors
hero.description: Earn revenue when readers use your books to learn languages with our innovative platform. Reach a new audience of language learners while being fairly compensated for your work.

section1.title: Get paid for your work
section1.overTitle: A new channel to monetize your work
section1.description: Fair and generous retribution to authors, for reading of the ebooks inside the app, and for referring our app to their followers and fans.

bulletPoint.referral: $10 per referred user that subscribes to LangoMango
bulletPoint.income: We share 50% of the income generated by user subscriptions with authors when users read your ebooks

section2.title: Expand your audience reach
section2.description: Tap into a growing market of language learners who are seeking engaging content. Your books become valuable learning tools, helping readers improve their language skills while enjoying your stories.

section3.title: Easy integration process
section3.description: Joining the LangoMango authors program is straightforward. Upload your ebooks, set your language preferences, and start earning. Our platform handles all the technical aspects of integrating your content with our language learning features.

section4.title: Detailed analytics
section4.description: Access comprehensive statistics about how readers engage with your books. See which titles are most popular, track reading completion rates, and understand how your content is being used for language learning.

section5.title: Supporting authors globally
section5.description: Join authors from around the world who are part of the LangoMango ecosystem. We support multiple languages and provide resources to help you succeed in the global language learning market.
